# Speed and heading

# Load libs

```{r load_libs, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
#set env
source("libs.R")
```

```{r}
load("ele_with_dem.rdata")
```

## Model: Speed ~ temp

```{r model}
library(mgcv)
ele.sf$id = as.factor(ele.sf$id)
mod.speed = bam(v ~ s(temp, k = 4) + season2 + woody.density + s(id, bs = "re") + slope, data = ele.sf)
```

## Fig 3a. Speed ~ temp

```{r ele.speed.temp.data}
#'
ele.speed.temp = 
  ele.sf %>% #filter(!id %in% problem_eles) %>%
  mutate(v.pred = predict(mod.speed, newdata = ., scale = "response", allow.new.levels = T), temp = round_any(temp,2)) %>%  group_by(season2, temp) %>%
  summarise(v.mean = mean(v), v.sd = sd(v), n.v = length(v), pred.mean = mean(v.pred, na.rm = T), pred.sd=sd(v.pred, na.rm = T), pred.n = length(v.pred)) %>%
  mutate(v.ci = qnorm(0.975)*v.sd/sqrt(n.v), ci.pred = qnorm(0.975)*pred.sd/sqrt(pred.n))
```

## speed and woody density and slope

```{r}
library(visreg)
speed_slope <- visreg(mod.speed, xvar = "slope", by = "season2", scale = "response", plot = F)$fit %>% 
  select(season2, slope, visregFit, visregUpr, visregLwr) %>% 
  #melt(id.vars = c("season2",'slope')) %>% 
  rename("var" = "slope") %>% mutate(var_name = "slope")
speed_wood <- visreg(mod.speed, xvar = "woody.density", by = "season2", scale = "response", plot = F)$fit %>% 
  select(season2, woody.density, visregFit, visregUpr, visregLwr) %>% 
  #melt(id.vars = c("season2",'woody.density')) %>% 
  rename("var" = "woody.density") %>% mutate(var_name = "wood.density")

data <- bind_rows(speed_slope,speed_wood)
```

```{r}
#review figs: speed vs slope, speed vs woody density
fig_speed_slope <- 
ggplot(data %>% filter(var_name == "slope"))+
  geom_ribbon(aes(x = var, ymin = visregLwr*2/1e3, ymax = visregUpr*2/1e3, fill = season2), alpha = 0.2)+
  geom_line(aes(x = var, y = visregFit*2/1e3, col = season2))+
  
  geom_rangeframe(data = data_frame(x=c(0,40),y=c(0.2,0.6)), aes(x,y))+
  
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = c(0,20,40))+
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = seq(0.2,0.6,0.2))+
  
  #facet_wrap(~var_name, scales = "free_x")+
  
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Set1")+
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Set1")+
  
  theme_pub()+
  labs(list(x = "Slope (degrees)", y = "Speed (km/h)",title = "(a)"))

fig_speed_wood <- 
ggplot(speed_wood)+
  geom_ribbon(aes(x = var, ymin = visregLwr*2/1e3, ymax = visregUpr*2/1e3, fill = season2), alpha = 0.2)+
  geom_line(aes(x = var, y = visregFit*2/1e3, col = season2))+
  
  geom_rangeframe(data = data_frame(x=c(0,80),y=c(0.2,0.6)), aes(x,y))+
  
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(0,80,20))+
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = seq(0.2,0.6,0.2))+
  
  #facet_wrap(~var_name, scales = "free_x")+
  
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Set1")+
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Set1")+
  
  theme_pub()+
  labs(list(x = "Woody density", y = "Speed (km/h)",title = "(b)"))
```

```{r}
#'speed vs time of day
ele2 <- as.data.frame(ele.sf) %>% 
  select(v, hour, season2) %>% 
  mutate(v2 = v*2/1e3) %>% 
  group_by(season2, hour) %>% 
  summarise_at(vars(v2),funs(mean,sd,length)) %>% 
  mutate(ci = qnorm(0.975)*sd/sqrt(length))

fig_speed_hour <- 
ggplot(ele2) +
  
  geom_rangeframe(data = data_frame(x=c(0,23),y=c(.15,.60)), aes(x,y))+
  
  geom_ribbon(aes(x = hour, ymin = mean-ci, ymax = mean+ci, fill = season2), alpha = 0.2)+
  geom_point(aes(x = hour, y = mean, col = season2,shape = season2))+
  
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Set1")+
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Set1")+
  scale_shape_manual(values = c(21,24))+
  theme_pub()+
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = c(0,6,12,18,23))+
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = seq(.150,.60,.150))+
  labs(list(y = "Speed (km/h)", x = "Hour of day"))

ggsave(filename = "figs/fig_speed_hour.png", fig_speed_hour, device = png(), height = half, width = half);dev.off()
```
